name: Zombie Hellscape
description:
Earth is scorched and desolate. You, a zombie simply wanting to eat some good brains, have found that it's not as easy as  your friends said it would be to just eat some brains on Earth. You've learned your lesson and now it's time to go home! The real challenge is being able to get back in one piece! Jump over obstacles, holes, climb down buildings and run your way back to Hell while getting your brains in this 3D platformer!

I hope you enjoy the game I designed! if you're  interested in my process, I was limited in what i could use for a theme as I was limited to an idea and also no money , so below I have put the creators of the assets I used as well as what assets they made!

Credit for code of 3D platformer is to Michael Baker.

credits for assets is below.

Credits to creators of Assets used:
Zombie Model: Pxltiger - pxltiger@gmail.com
Brain Model: X-Factory - https://www.x-factory-assets.com/   
Lava Texture: Casual2D - http://casual2d.com
Skull platform and Particle/ Flame effects: Kubiqual - https://www.artstation.com/ramonavladut
Wasteland Buildings and Objects: Aquarius Max - http://www.aquariusmax.com
